titleStmt.title: Sir Thomas Smithes voiage and entertainment in Rushia With the tragicall ends of two emperors, and one empresse, within one moneth during his being there: and the miraculous preseruation of the now raigning emperor, esteemed dead for 18. yeares.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Thomas, Sir, 1558?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By W. White and W. Jaggard] for Nathanyell Butter,

notesStmt.note: White printed quires I through ¹M; Jaggard the rest (STC and addendum)).
Running title reads: Sir Thomas Smiths voyage into Rushia.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
